description: This brown rice pudding is filling and more nutritious than the classic recipe.
keywords: Rice pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Peanut free
name: Cinnamon & Vanilla Brown Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rice, milk, nutmeg and cinnamon to a large, heavy bottomed saucepan and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is cooked through.
Stir through the honey, vanilla and butter and serve.
